languages.text: "Славно, мон-кай. Что ж, раз предложение передано... я вынужден откланяться. Надеюсь, ты как следует развлечешь моих подданных, что я оставляю взамен себя".

traits.locale_text: "Славно, мон-кай. Что ж, раз предложение передано... я вынужден откланяться. Надеюсь, ты как следует развлечешь моих подданных, что я оставляю взамен себя".

languages.text: "Splendid, mon-keigh. Well, now that the offer has been extended... I must take my leave. I hope you prove diverting for my subjects, whom I leave in my stead."
languages.original_text: "Славно, мон-кай. Что ж, раз предложение передано... я вынужден откланяться. Надеюсь, ты как следует развлечешь моих подданных, что я оставляю взамен себя".

traits.locale_text: "Splendid, mon-keigh. Well, now that the offer has been extended... I must be taking my leave. I do hope you prove an excellent entertainment for my subjects, whom I leave in my stead."
"Splendid, mon-keigh. Well, now that the offer has been extended... I must be taking my leave. I do hope you prove an excellent entertainment for my subjects, whom I leave in my stead."
"Splendid, mon-keigh. Well, now that the offer has been extended... I must take my leave. I hope you prove diverting for my subjects, whom I leave in my stead."
"Splendid, mon-keigh. Well, now that the offer has been extended... I must take my leave. I hope you prove diverting for my subjects, whom I leave in my stead."
"Splendid, mon-keigh. Well, now that the offer has been extended... I must take my leave. I hope you prove diverting for my subjects, whom I leave in my stead."

languages.text: «Excelente, mon-keigh. Bueno, ahora que te he hecho la oferta... debo marcharme. Espero que entretengas a mis súbditos, a quienes dejo en mi lugar».
languages.original_text: "Splendid, mon-keigh. Well, now that the offer has been extended... I must take my leave. I hope you prove diverting for my subjects, whom I leave in my stead."

traits.locale_text: «Excelente, mon-keigh. Bueno, ahora que te he hecho la oferta... debo marcharme. Espero que entretengas a mis súbditos, a quienes dejo en mi lugar».

languages.text: “太棒了，猴子。好吧，既然提议已经传达到了……那我必须告辞了。希望我不在的这段时间里，你能为我的臣民们带来乐趣。”
languages.original_text: "Splendid, mon-keigh. Well, now that the offer has been extended... I must take my leave. I hope you prove diverting for my subjects, whom I leave in my stead."

traits.locale_text: “太棒了，猴子。好吧，既然提议已经传达到了……那我必须告辞了。希望我不在的这段时间里，你能为我的臣民们带来乐趣。”

languages.text: 「素晴らしい心意気だ、モン＝ケイ。さて、申し出にも応じてもらったことだ…俺はそろそろ失礼する。後は部下たちに任せよう。せいぜい彼らを楽しませてやってくれ」
languages.original_text: "Splendid, mon-keigh. Well, now that the offer has been extended... I must take my leave. I hope you prove diverting for my subjects, whom I leave in my stead."

traits.locale_text: 「素晴らしい心意気だ、モン＝ケイ。さて、申し出にも応じてもらったことだ…俺はそろそろ失礼する。後は部下たちに任せよう――せいぜい彼らを楽しませてやってくれ」

languages.text: "Ausgezeichnet, Chem-Pan-Sey. Nun, nachdem das Angebot unterbreitet wurde ... muss ich gehen. Ich hoffe, Ihr erweist Euch als gute Ablenkung für meine Untertanen, die ich an meiner Stelle zurücklasse."
languages.original_text: "Splendid, mon-keigh. Well, now that the offer has been extended... I must take my leave. I hope you prove diverting for my subjects, whom I leave in my stead."

traits.locale_text: "Ausgezeichnet, Chem-Pan-Sey. Nun, nachdem das Angebot unterbreitet wurde ... muss ich gehen. Ich hoffe, Ihr erweist Euch als gute Ablenkung für meine Untertanen, die ich an meiner Stelle zurücklasse."

languages.original_text: "Splendid, mon-keigh. Well, now that the offer has been extended... I must take my leave. I hope you prove diverting for my subjects, whom I leave in my stead."

languages.text: « Excellent, mon-keigh. Bien, maintenant que vous avez accepté mon invitation... je dois prendre congé. Je vous laisse en compagnie de mes sujets, j'espère que vous saurez les divertir. »
languages.original_text: "Splendid, mon-keigh. Well, now that the offer has been extended... I must take my leave. I hope you prove diverting for my subjects, whom I leave in my stead."

traits.locale_text: « Excellent, mon-keigh. Bien, maintenant que vous avez accepté mon invitation... je dois prendre congé. Je vous laisse en compagnie de mes sujets, j'espère que vous saurez les divertir. »

languages.text: "Harikulade mon-keigh. Teklifimi de yaptığıma göre artık gitmem icap eder. Yerime geçecek tebaam da senden keyif alacaktır sanıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Splendid, mon-keigh. Well, now that the offer has been extended... I must take my leave. I hope you prove diverting for my subjects, whom I leave in my stead."

traits.locale_text: "Harikulade mon-keigh. Teklifimi de yaptığıma göre artık gitmem icap eder. Yerime geçecek tebaam da senden keyif alacaktır sanıyorum."
